meta.name: Only Connect Specials
meta.description: Victoria Coren Mitchell returns to host some special episodes of Only Connect.

videos.title: The Only Connect Pub Quiz: Hopsters v Taverners
videos.overview: Charge your glasses, it's the Only Connect Pub Quiz! The format has been tweaked, and the budget has been blown on several packs of pork scratchings.4: Revolver, 3: Swept Away, 2: Snatch… what comes next?

videos.title: Christmas Special: Whitcombes v Gardners
videos.overview: It's Christmas, and two families from series gone by have battled traffic jams and rail replacement bus services to come together to play an exasperating game. So far so Christmassy.Here's a question: Sharon Horgan, JB Gill, Farmer Bean, Bernard Matthews – what's the connection?

videos.title: Law Special: Cartophiles v Harmonics
videos.overview: The law is under the spotlight in this episode. As indeed is a judge's wig, which turns out to be surprisingly itchy.Criminal at large, claim brought to court, item of baggage… what might come fourth in the sequence?

videos.title: Third-Place Play-Off Play-Off Special: Poptimists v Ramblers
videos.overview: Ever wondered who would triumph if the winners of the third-place play-off from one series took on the winners of the play-off from another?They face this sequence question: chess, fünf, evri… what comes next?
